Event.MetaDescription: You are cordially invited Global Organization for Divinity, UK and Sri Rama Nama Setu Extends a personal invitation to you all for a spiritual lecture By Sri M.K.Ramanujamji about "Discard Desire; Develop Devotion"
Event.Address: London Sri Murugan Temple, Manor Park, E12 6AF
Event.Maindescription:
You are cordially invited
Global Organization for Divinity, UK and Sri Rama Nama Setu
Extends a personal invitation to you all for a spiritual lecture
By Sri M.K.Ramanujamji
Disciple of His Holiness Sri Sri Muralidhara Swamigal
‘Ancient Wisdom for modern times’
ஆசையை அறுமின்; அன்பை வளர்மின்
(Discard Desire; Develop Devotion)
